snippet: A comics shop in Red Bank, N.J., owned by the writer-director Kevin Smith and run by his buddies, is going to be the subject of a reality show on AMC.
abstract: Jay and Silent Bob's Secret Stash, a comics shop in Red Bank, NJ, owned by the writer-director Kevin Smith and run by his buddies, is going to be the subject of Comic Book Men, a reality show on AMC.
lead_paragraph: A comics shop in Red Bank, N.J., owned by the writer-director Kevin Smith and run by his buddies, is going to be the subject of a reality show on AMC.

headline.seo: AMC Goes Inside Kevin Smith’s Comic Book Shop
headline.main: Cameras Invade a Paradise for Fanboys
headline.print_headline: Cameras Invade A Paradise For Fanboys
